TEXT.English: It is the year 400 AD. North of the flourishing Tiwanaku, the rist of the Wari Empire heralds what will soon become the first major Andean power struggle...
It is the year 600 AD. The Wari Empire is in the middle of a cold war with their southern neighbors...
+1 Food on tiles adjacent to Mountains.
